nodes.text: Admiral Block of the Galactic Republic served aboard the Venator-class Star Destroyer Vigilance during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In 19 BBY, Block commanded Republic naval forces as Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and Quinlan Vos led an attack on the Confederacy's listening post on the planet Vanqor.
However, Vos had secretly warned his master, Count Dooku, about the attack and the Separatists were able to evacuate the facility before Republic forces arrived.

Block appeared in the 2015 novel Dark Disciple, written by Christie Golden and adapted from an unfinished eight-episode story arc for the Star Wars: The Clone Wars animated series that was written by Katie Lucas, Matt Michnovetz, and Dave Filoni. Block was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 2008 reference title The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, written by Stephen J. Sansweet, Pablo Hidalgo, Bob Vitas, Daniel Wallace, Chris Cassidy, Mary Franklin, and Josh Kushins.
